thread.title: The saga of the SABC about Motsoeneng
thread.title_full: The saga of the SABC about Motsoeneng | News24

author: news24.com
title: The saga of the SABC about Motsoeneng
text: This is just to show that a comrade will always be protected come what may. Where is Ben Ngubane in all this mess? How was the man employed in the first place? What happened after it was discovered that he was a fraud? Protected. This is how the ANC operate. There is a lot of examples like this. If it was in the private sector, the man would have been fired there and then and a case of fraud opened against him. Investigate if Mutambi is also not a fraud. Birds of the same feather flies together,
